pageContext.claim: “President Erdoğan, who has done -- he gave me our pastor back. Pastor Brunson. Nobody else could get him back. Remember? They couldn't get him back. President Obama, he was in jail for 35 years. He was going to be in jail forever. Pastor Brunson, he was an innocent man.”
pageContext.analysis: An absurd claim. Brunson, who was 50 at the time of his release, was imprisoned in Turkey for two years.
